biotools.summary: An open-source active surface tool for single-cell segmentation in 3D microscopy images. It is a plugin for Medical Imaging Interaction Toolkit (https://www.mitk.org/).

bioschemas.name: 3D-Cell-Annotator
bioschemas.summary: An open-source active surface tool for single-cell segmentation in 3D microscopy images. It is a plugin for Medical Imaging Interaction Toolkit (https://www.mitk.org/).
